{"step_by_step_thinking": "GIC stands for Glass Ionomer Cement, a type of dental cement. It was not developed by Barnum, who is known for his work in dental impressions. Bowen is known for his work on dental composites, not GIC. Herman is known for his work on dental radiography. Wilson and Kent are known for their work on Glass Ionomer Cement.", "answer_choice": "B"}
